statusLine.command: input=$(cat); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); wt=$(basename "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel 2>/dev/null)" 2>/dev/null); branch=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); BLUE='\033[38;2;137;180;250m'; GREEN='\033[38;2;166;227;161m'; RED='\033[38;2;243;139;168m'; DIM='\033[2m'; RESET='\033[0m'; case "$wt" in bitfocus-buttons-1) COLOR="$BLUE";; bitfocus-buttons-2) COLOR="$GREEN";; bitfocus-buttons-3) COLOR="$RED";; *) COLOR="";; esac; label=""; if [ -n "$wt" ] && [ -n "$COLOR" ]; then label="$(printf '%b%s%b' "$COLOR" "$wt" "$RESET")"; elif [ -n "$wt" ]; then label="$wt"; fi; if [ -n "$branch" ] && [ -n "$label" ]; then label="$(printf '%s %b%s%b' "$label" "$DIM" "$branch" "$RESET")"; elif [ -n "$branch" ]; then label="$(printf '%b%s%b' "$DIM" "$branch" "$RESET")"; fi; if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); if [ -n "$label" ]; then printf "[%d%%] %b" "$pct" "$label"; else printf "[%d%%]" "$pct"; fi; else if [ -n "$label" ]; then printf "%b" "$label"; fi; fi
